newsitem.title: INDIA: India Reliance up 3.2 pct before results.
newsitem.headline: India Reliance up 3.2 pct before results.

text.p: Shares of Reliance Industries Ltd rose on Bombay exchanges ahead of the petrochemical giant's annual results, brokers said on Tuesday.
The market awash with speculation that the company will unveil net profit of 13.50 billion rupees for the year ended March 31, 1997, against 13.05 billion a year ago, they said.
Consensus estimates of 28 leading securities and brokerage houses polled by Reuters had placed the net profit lower at 12.06 billion rupees.
Reliance board is scheduled to begin its board meeting at 1200 hours (0630 GMT).
The share rose 10 rupees, or 3.2 percent, to 317.75 on the Bombay Stock Exchange, after rising 10 percent on Monday.
On the National exchange, the share gained 15.50 rupees to 314.80.
